name: Retro Tanks - Unity course project
description:
"Peliohjelmoinnin alkeet unitylla" - The basics of game programming with unity. -course¨s product.

This is simple retro stylized arena shooter with tanks -game. It doesnt really have name or anything. 

How to play: 

  1. Move: WASD
  2. Shoot: Mouse
  3. Pause: Esc

You may freely study/use project as you please.
